name: @araxiaonline/mpq-tools-osx
description: Node.js wrapper for MPQ archive manipulation for MacOSX using mpqcli

scripts.postinstall: cd mpqcli && cmake -B build && cmake --build build
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags

author: ben-of-codecraft
